title: [Bug]: unexpected switch to a different chat
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Screen switches into a random chat 

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.11

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
The bug became being steady reproducible and appeared approx. on version ~2.0.9. It can happen any time, but here's how i managed to reproduce it manually:
1. Open up an image which was previously sent in a chat
2. Right click -> Copy image

And there we go: the image all of the sudden closes and the screen switches to a random chat.

Please note: after app restart, the issue is gone for a time being, but over the course of the time it's back again.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
teams-for-linux works without random switches as in the website/PWA
```

### Debug

```markdown

```

### Additional context

_No response_
